mapper.select: select count(*) from block_detail where branch_no = #{branchNo} and `status` = 1
select id from block_detail where `status` = 0 and branch_no = #{branchNo} limit #{limit}
mapper.update: update block_detail set `status` = #{status}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from block_detail a join block_order_item b on a.id = b.b_detail_id join block_order c on b.b_order_id = c.order_id where c.order_id = #{orderId}

select a.id, c.spec, c.no_valid_date as noValid, c.order_id, a.till_id as `type`, concat(e.province, e.city, e.detailed_address) as address from block_detail as a join block_order_item as b on a.id = b.b_detail_id join block_order as c on b.b_order_id = c.order_id join farm_manager as d on c.farm_manager_id = d.fm_id join farm as e on d.fm_id = e.fm_id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.status in (1, 2) and a.type = #{status}
mapper.update: update block_detail set till_id = #{till} where id = #{id}
